snippet: Serge Ibaka, who scored a career-high 26 points in Game 4, epitomized how the Thunder have outplayed the Spurs in tying the Western Conference finals at two games each.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka, who scored a career-high 26 points in Game 4, epitomized how the Thunder have outplayed the San Antonio Spurs in tying the Western Conference finals at two games each.
lead_paragraph: Serge Ibaka, who scored a career-high 26 points in Game 4, epitomized how the Thunder have outplayed the Spurs in tying the Western Conference finals at two games each.

headline.seo: Serge Ibaka Helps Thunder Tie Series Against Spurs
headline.main: Ibaka Is ‘Maybe a Surprise to You,’ but Not to Him or the Thunder
headline.print_headline: Ibaka Isn’t Surprising Himself Or Thunder
